segments.text: Do you have a park in the city ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , there is a lake in the park . It is very beautiful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s great . We can go boating on the lake in the afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s a good idea . But I am afraid it ’ s too cold . It is very windy on the lake .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then we can take a walk and enjoy the scenery in the park .
segments.speaker: S1
